Room.Name: Jerome's School for Fighters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a famous school which only accepts advanced fighters for training.
Room.LongDescription: If this is your first time here, you can train in the green room, but it won't be easy! Be prepared for the fight of your life. Fighter's who have already accomplished that feat may train in the blue room. The red room is reserved for fighters who have gone through both the green and blue room's training.
